section.name: Stand-alone Installation
section.p: The stand-alone installation can be used on any platform, and only requires that Java (version 5 or later) is installed.

ol.li: Unpack the zip-file (subsonic-x.x-standalone.zip) to <SUBSONIC_HOME>/standalone. (SUBSONIC_HOME is typically c:\subsonic on Windows, and /var/subsonic on Unix-based operating systems.)
